extendedInfo.description: Duke A.Blizzardo, an evil pirate King, terrorizes the Caribbean. You seek revenge, as he was the one who took your father away. Â Now it is your time to become a great leader and gather a party of hardened pirates to take his place away from him. Â On your journey you will have to master difficult battles with barracudas, mermaids, strange undead, monkeys, Indians and fearsome pirates. Â You start on an lonely island with a small boat. Over time your party and town grow until you are powerful enough to encounter A.Blizzardo. Â Gather powerful weapons, build crazy buildings, hold funny events and become the pirate king.This is the first game from the studio Epic Devs. We hope you enjoy your stay in our game and savour the awesome pixel art, which will remind you of the unique Kairosoft games and their artwork. Â Epic Pirates Story should show you the potential of our team, and we hope that you will enjoy all the upcoming titles that we are working on like: Epic Movies Story, Epic Car Story and The Conquest: Colonization.

reviews.title: Good one
reviews.comment: This game is cute and with beautiful pixel graphics, i thing that it is very good for first game developed by new company.

reviews.title: Overall
reviews.comment: A decent pirate simulation, but the difficulty spikes after about the fourth pirate you unlock, to the point where you need to leave the game for the pirates to auto train stats, needs manual training, and should not need a rest period for pirates if they did not get ko\'d during a quest, good concept though
reviews.author: Laszlo Szita

reviews.title: Playable mermaid?
reviews.comment: 4stars cause I really really want a playable mermaid that can walk with her tail please please please get a mermaid :-) please
reviews.author: Denise Bruce

reviews.comment: Brilliant!
reviews.author: gel roberts

reviews.title: Too slow!
reviews.comment: This game gets so slow and stuttered after you get a few pirates. Becomes impossible to play right when it gets fun.
reviews.author: Amanda Vega

reviews.title: Thanks anyway.
reviews.comment: Might have been ok, but forced to play in landscape, so deleted almost instantly. Gave the interface about 30 seconds to win me over, which failed.
reviews.author: Momma Minerva

reviews.title: kairosoft wannabe but falls short
reviews.comment: Not nearly as entertaining or engrossing as the kairosoft games. Growth in game seems stunted and there\'s no real desire to buy the full app.
reviews.author: Par Cae

reviews.title: Pretty good.
reviews.comment: For the most part, the game is really good. Plays smoothly, is light-hearted, and its pirates. The only real downside is the in-game help files leave a lot to be desired. The worst offender is the Beastiary. It says it has all the info on all the various mobs you will encounter, yet doesn\'t actually provide anything. It\'s just not there. Please dev, either clarify or fix this.
reviews.author: Nick Deal

reviews.title: Fun, but imbalanced
reviews.comment: Difficulty level ramps up too quickly and you\'re left waiting around for your pirates to get stronger before you can go out on missions. Graphics are great and interface is better than kairosoft games (which this is clearly influenced by).
reviews.author: James Lin

reviews.title: Booooooring
reviews.comment: So boring.
reviews.author: Victoria Gasienica

reviews.title: funny!
reviews.comment: good and buggy
reviews.author: Chao Han

reviews.title: GJ
reviews.comment: Thanks anyway
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun&free!
reviews.comment: Cute graphics, simple but interesting gameplay and catchy bgm, great job developers :)
reviews.author: Shiying Ho

reviews.title: Totally awesome!
reviews.comment: This is the best game I\'ve ever played! What kind of company let the lite version of the game have the exact same features as the full version? A seriously good one. You get to control a crew of pirates, sail off to find treasures and fight sea monsters! If you like pirates, stratergy, high-sea action, having your own island, this is the perfect game for you! A must install top-rated game! Way to go, devs, please produse more games like this! :)
reviews.author: Alvin Lee

reviews.title: Fun but...
reviews.comment: Great game but it starts to lag worse and worse the more pirates, buildings you have. Also I would like to have the ability to sell off or delete old equipment. Great time killer other than that.
reviews.author: Casey Clifton

reviews.title: Choppy Text
reviews.comment: Please fix the choppy text that appears when characters are speaking to you. Instead of words flowing smoothly in dialogue, they are displayed one at a time. This gives it an annoying, unpolished look and I immediately noticed it. Otherwise the graphics and gameplay are great and smooth.
reviews.author: Nick Stommel

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Very fun, no serious complaints, please let us sell our old equipment though personally I just hate the clutter it creates.
reviews.author: Cameron Bell

reviews.title: One of the best so far
reviews.comment: Although it \'borrows\' heavily from the Kairosoft sims, EPS have enough personality to win you over! Good graphic design, great music, fun gameplay. Tried many games, but this one is a great total package. Going to play some more of the lite version but plan to purchase.
reviews.author: John Marcolini

reviews.title: WHO CARES ABT KAIROSOFT?!
reviews.comment: Kairosoft charge for their games. This is better. Wayyyy better. Thanx developers...

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Great game and it\'s FREE!no lag no crashes n i\'ve exacted my defence! XD
reviews.author: min hime
